title: Suggested Players not quite working as intended...
body: As per the title, the Suggested Players feature is a bit odd at the moment - in the included link, you can see it suggesting I invite... myself. Beyond that, the amount of invites I receive from friends of friends through the Suggested Players feature seems a bit excessive - it would be nice if there were a way to opt-out or disable friends of friends being able to invite you, for those of us on the antisocial end of the spectrum :P
